CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- 홍팀 윷던지기 버튼 클릭
if _YutMainLogic.canPushThrowButton == true then _YutMainLogic.canPushThrowButton = false
local num = math.random(1,5) self.Num = num log("던진 숫자" .. tostring(self.Num))
--결과UI보여주기 local ResultUI = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/도개걸윷모") local Text = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/도개걸윷모/Mo/UISprite_1")
if self.Num == 1 then Text.TextComponent.Text = "도" elseif self.Num == 2 then Text.TextComponent.Text = "개" elseif self.Num == 3 then Text.TextComponent.Text = "걸" elseif self.Num == 4 then Text.TextComponent.Text = "윷" elseif self.Num == 5 then Text.TextComponent.Text = "모" end
ResultUI:SetEnable(true) wait(1.5) ResultUI:SetEnable(false)
_YutMainLogic.canPieceSelected = true
self.Red_button:SetVisible(false) self.Red_button:SetEnable(false)
self.Blue_button:SetEnable(true) self.Blue_button:SetVisible(true)
_ThrowLogic:Throw(self.Num)
--버튼바뀌기
end
